attributes.action: cancel the introduction of the government's Identity Card scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of a Identity Card scheme is a direct infringment of the fundamental freedoms long fought for by the British people. It is unnecessary, unwanted and impractical. A criminal act by 20 foreigners at 9/11 plus other criminal acts is not sufficient reason to attack our basic liberties.
